attributes.action: Stop budget cut on all Emergency Services in UK
attributes.additional_details:
All signatures on this petitions are in favour of stopping all budget cuts to all Emergency Services in the UK (including Fire & Rescue, Ambulances, Police and RNLI), and increase funding instead.

We want the Government to Stop all budget cuts that effect any Emergency Services in the UK.  Increase funding too; this is in response to recent events and this shows how under funded our Emergency Services really are.
